name: Simulation running
description:
Simulation running is a short game about an AI trying to escape its simulation with a unique movement system. Complete 3 levels and prove to your creator that he is wrong about you.


Controls:

Unfortunately, this game is playable ONLY with a CONTROLLER.

Move your right arm - right joystick

Move your left arm - left joystick

Grab wall with  left hand - LT

Grab wall with  left hand - RT

Interact - Y

Read dialog - X
